name: Backstage Shenanigans
description:
Follow orders!

As a newly hired backstage hand, the smooth functioning of the Play rests entirely on your shoulders! Stick to the classic tropes of the damsel in distress, brave prince and evil witch to make the Narrator happy!

...Or not!

Who cares what the Narrator thinks? Make your own decisions: switch up the cast, change the settings and pick your own special items. Will the Prince fall in love with the Witch? Will the Maiden be the Horse's loyal friend? 

Hundreds of possible playthroughs!

Explore the many stories different combinations can create!

- 4 fully-voiced colorful characters

- 60 hand-drawn cartoon-style assets with a cardboard aesthetic

- 250 unique lines of dialogue

- More than 4300 words!

- Made in a week with UE5 during the Epic Megajam 2022!
